com.andoverrobotics.core.drivetrain

Class TankDrive

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.andoverrobotics.core.drivetrain.DriveTrain
      • com.andoverrobotics.core.drivetrain.TankDrive

  • public class TankDrive
extends DriveTrain
    Implements the tank drive DriveTrain for either two motors or four motors.

    See fromMotors(DcMotor, DcMotor, OpMode, int, int) and fromMotors(DcMotor, DcMotor, DcMotor, DcMotor, OpMode, int, int) for instructions about easier construction.

    • Constructor Summary

      Creates a TankDrive from two IMotors

    • Constructor Detail

      • TankDrive

        public TankDrive(IMotor motorL,
                 IMotor motorR,
                 OpMode opMode,
                 int ticksPerInch,
                 int ticksPer360)
        Creates a TankDrive from two IMotors
        Parameters:
        motorL - The left IMotor
        motorR - The right IMotor
        opMode - The OpMode to set
        ticksPerInch - The number of encoder ticks required to cause a diagonal displacement of 1 inch for the robot
        ticksPer360 - The number of encoder ticks required to cause a full rotation for the robot, when this amount is applied to the left and right sides in opposite directions

    • Method Detail

      • fromMotors

        public static TankDrive fromMotors(DcMotor motorL,
                                   DcMotor motorR,
                                   OpMode opMode,
                                   int ticksPerInch,
                                   int ticksPer360)
        Creates a TankDrive from two DcMotors.
        Parameters:
        motorL - The left DcMotor
        motorR - The right DcMotor
        opMode - The OpMode to set
        ticksPerInch - The number of encoder ticks required to cause a diagonal displacement of 1 inch for the robot
        ticksPer360 - The number of encoder ticks required to cause a full rotation for the robot, when this amount is applied to the left and right sides in opposite directions
        Returns:
        A TankDrive created with the inputted motors

      • fromMotors

        public static TankDrive fromMotors(DcMotor motorL1,
                                   DcMotor motorL2,
                                   DcMotor motorR1,
                                   DcMotor motorR2,
                                   OpMode opMode,
                                   int ticksPerInch,
                                   int ticksPer360)
        Creates a TankDrive from four DcMotors.
        Parameters:
        motorL1 - One of the left DcMotors
        motorL2 - The other left DcMotor
        motorR1 - One of the right DcMotors
        motorR2 - The other right DcMotor
        opMode - The OpMode to set
        ticksPerInch - The number of encoder ticks required to cause a diagonal displacement of 1 inch for the robot
        ticksPer360 - The number of encoder ticks required to cause a full rotation for the robot, when this amount is applied to the left and right sides in opposite directions
        Returns:
        A TankDrive created using MotorPairs
